title: WATCH: Nev & Carra's referee trial
text:
Gary Neville and Jamie Carragher tested in 'The Referees - Onside with Carragher and Neville'   10:39am Do Gary Neville and Jamie Carragher have what it takes to be a professional referee? 'The Referees', coming soon... Do Gary Neville and Jamie Carragher have what it takes to be professional referees? 
The pundits were put through their paces by Premier League referees for a special programme to be shown on April 2 on Sky Sports called The Referees - Onside with Carragher & Neville . 
From brandishing the cards to running the line to even taking a fitness test, the Monday Night Football duo were tested on every aspect of being a referee. Jamie Carragher has a go at running the line in The Referees 
The former England internationals also sat down with a number of the Premier League's top officials to give an insight into what it takes to referee in England's top flight, analysing some key decisions from the season so far along the way. 
And there's also a reenactment of Mike Dean's famous celebration after playing an advantage which allowed Tottenham to score in their 3-1 win over Aston Villa last season! Gary Neville sits down with the Premier League referees 
How did Neville and Carragher get on? This one line tells the story with former Liverpool defender Carragher saying to referee Neil Swarbrick: "I will never ever criticise you ever again!" 
Watch a short taste of Jamie Carragher and Gary Neville being put through their paces by the Premier League referees by hitting play on the video above. Coming soon to Sky Sports... The Referees
